titles.title: To prohibit the issuance, promotion, or sale of digital assets that use the name, likeness, or identifiable traits of certain federal officials or their immediate family for financial gain, and to establish regulatory oversight under the Securities and Exchange Commission.

To prohibit the issuance, promotion, or sale of digital assets that use the name, likeness, or identifiable traits of certain federal officials or their immediate family for financial gain, and to establish regulatory oversight under the Securities and Exchange Commission.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
